name: 楊侑倫
objective:
先修課程：3002010 或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 
1. fundamental metallographic concepts.
2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.
3. Hardenability 
4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 
5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.
schedule:
Introduction (week 1)
1. Backgrouds of Material Science for metals (week 2-3)
2. Strengthening mechanisms for metals (week 4-5)
3. Thermal mechanical treatment (week 6-7)
-------Mid-term Exam------- (week 8)
4. Heat treatment technology of steel (week 9-11)
5. Surface hardening treatment (week 12-13)
6. Heat treatment technology of non-ferrous alloys (week 14-16)
-------Final Exam------- (week 17)
scorePolicy:
Homework 40%
Midterm oral exam 30%
Final oral exam 30%
